headline: Baxter Launches Welch Allyn Connex 360 Vital Signs Monitor to Advance Connected Patient Monitoring
summary: DEERFIELD, Ill., September 16, 2025--Baxter International Inc. (NYSE:BAX), a leading global medtech company, today launched the Welch Allyn Connex 360 Vital Signs Monitor, its next generation patient monitoring device. As the latest innovation in Baxter’s connected monitoring portfolio, Connex 360 offers an advanced connectivity and security platform, customizable configurations based on a hospital’s clinical routines, and upgrade capabilities that set the stage for future functionality and enha
